channel.title: [SOLVED] Armory (Bitcoin Wallet) on Whonix 8/Debian Stable
channel.description:
I would like to install Armory Bitcoin Wallet in Whonix 8.
For Whonix 7 it was very easy, I downloaded the file from the armory website, double click and install it.
For Whonix 8 this workaround is not possible (I think because it is Debian stable and not testing).
Please can anyone explain how it works? Or is there any website that explains an easy workaround (I am very new in Linux)?
Thanks a lot!

item.title: [SOLVED] Armory (Bitcoin Wallet) on Whonix 8/Debian Stable
item.dc:creator: Occq
item.description:
Follow the instructions of Gregory.

Tech

Building Bitcoin Armory from Source On Debian 7 Wheezy and / Or Ubuntu 16.04

The following is basically a rendition of the Bitcoin Armory Ubuntu build instructions found at https://bitcoinarmory.com/download/building-armory-from-source/

Read full topic
